reviews.text: Only the north bound platform is usable nowadays after the bridge was removed. One train a day at 0723.

What a depressing station, only one train in the morning at 7:23 to Crewe and nothing else, only 1 platform and the platform 2 that was once there has fallen into disrepair since the WCML's upgrade as they said it would be 2 expensive to replace the footbridge. It's all very sad. :(

It’s absolutely rubbish if you need to commute with only 1 train towards Crewe in the morning and no return trip, however if you’re looking for a half decent train watching spot then this’ll do, although Tamworth station is a better shout. Super quiet here and very difficult to get taxis

Unattended four track rail station with generally one morning service and no serviceable platform 2 to return to. Express and freight regularly pass through on this busy Rugby - Stafford line. Remains of footbridge visible, but site of the old signal box now covered in grass.
